question: 1.	Your friend recently moved to the same town where your friend lives. Please write a letter to invite your friend to go to the gym together. In your lettero	describe why you go to this gymo	say what part of this gym you recommendo	explain why you think it is suitable for your friend
text: I hope that this letter finds you well. I'm glad to hear from your mother that you have moved to Gurgaon. I let you that one of my friends living in the same sector as well where you are living.

As you know that I'm particularly concerned with my fitness and always try to challenge my fitness level. Given that, I joined the gym which is just a few km away from my place as it really helps me to keep myself in shape.

I really enjoy the part of this gym where I perform weight training because you can not only train your muscles with the available equipment but also use your own body to train your body and mind at the same time. Moreover, the trainer makes it really comfortable and always inspires me to go the extra mile.

I think it'll suit your fitness needs too as you want to shed extra pounds off. Besides, you can do exercises which will be accustomed to your goals by experts. In addition, in my opinion, it will be a walk in the park to lose fat if you join the gym.
Hope that you'll consider my recommendation. Looking forward to hearing from you.
